item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:

9. Objects Have Not Failed (2002) (17 points | 22 comments)

11. Immutable Systems: NixOS + systemd-repart + systemd-sysupdate (24 points | 10 comments)

13. Introducing Alacrity to Federated Cryptography (22 points | 6 comments)

15. The 2030 Rust Update (21 points | 1 comment)

17. "This Key is Useless Now. Discard?" (42 points | 26 comments)

22. How I learned to stop worrying and love userspace networking (6 points | 3 comments)

24. Farewell pandas, and thanks for all the fish (6 points | 2 comments)
25. The slow evaporation of the free/open source surplus (36 points | 30 comments)
